p: The toxicity of CS-LO was determined in RAW 264.7 cells by MTT assay; the result is shown in Figure 1(a). Cell viability did not change at 0, 2.5, 5, 10, 20, and 40 μg/mL of CS-LO. These results suggest that there were no toxic to RAW 264.7 cells under 40 μg/mL of CS-LO. Therefore, CS-LO (2.5-10 μg/mL) was used in the subsequent experiments.
